plot: Through the lives of two contemporary artists, Chimeras freeze-frames China at the moment when its aspirations are at war with its sense of identity.
title: Chimeras

plot_en: Through the lives of two contemporary artists, Chimeras freeze-frames China at the moment when its aspirations are at war with its sense of identity.

cast.role: Himself, close friend of Wang Guangyi
